CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The highest PCE of PSCs based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system reached 2.71% , which was lower than the 4-5 % of the P3HT : PCBM devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSCs |
| PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM |
| PC |
| PCBM |
| P3HT : PCBM |

Explanation:

* PSCs: Presumably stands for "Polymer Solar Cells," but it is not explicitly written in the text. However, it is mentioned as the highest PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) of PSCs was reached.
* PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM: This is a specific type of polymer solar cell material mentioned in the text.
* PC: This is a material mentioned in the text, which is a part of the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system.
* PCBM: This is a material mentioned in the text, which is a part of the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system and P3HT : PCBM devices.
* P3HT : PCBM: This is a material mentioned in the text, which is a type of polymer solar cell material.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM |
| PC |
| PCBM |

Explanation:

* PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM: This is a specific type of polymer solar cell material mentioned in the text.
* PC: This is a material mentioned in the text, which is a part of the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system.
* PCBM: This is a material mentioned in the text, which is a part of the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system and P3HT : PCBM devices.

The other entities, PSCs and P3HT : PCBM, are not clear material names. PSCs is an abbreviation for Polymer Solar Cells, but it is not a specific material. P3HT : PCBM is a type of polymer solar cell material, but it is not explicitly mentioned as a material name in the text.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The highest PCE of PSCs based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system reached 2.71% , which was lower than the 4-5 % of the P3HT : PCBM devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system |
| 4-5 % |
| P3HT : PCBM devices |

Explanation:

* PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
* PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system (Highest Power Conversion Efficiency of Photosensitizer Complexes based on the PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system)
* 4-5 % (Percentage of Power Conversion Efficiency)
* P3HT : PCBM devices (Photosensitizer Complexes based on the P3HT : PCBM devices)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |

Explanation:

* PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) is the only clear material property mentioned in the paragraph.

The other entities, such as PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) : PC 70 BM system and P3HT : PCBM devices, are specific systems or complexes, not properties. The percentage values mentioned are related to the PCE property, but they are not properties themselves.
